review.reviewText:
Exercise 1: In our eyes, the solution fits as it is.We didn't find any bug or mistake in the queries and each runs perfectly in the system. We have nothing to remark.
Exercise 2: In our eyes, the solution fits as it is. We have nothing to remark.
Exercise 3: Question 1: Answer is correct but question also asked about examples which is missing in the answer. Question 2: In our eyes, answer is correct with proper example. Question 3: In our eyes, answer is correct with proper example.
